HEADING: Your juror details

GUIDANCE_TITLE: I don't have a juror number

GUIDANCE_INTRO: If you don't have a juror number, please contact
GUIDANCE_INTRO_OB: If you don't have a juror number for the person you are replying for, please contact
FIELD_LAST_NAME_HINT: Please enter your last name as it is printed on the jury summons letter, even if this might be incorrect. You can change it further on.
FIELD_LAST_NAME_HINT_OB: Please enter the last name as it is printed on the jury summons letter, even if this might be incorrect. You can change it further on.
FIELD_POSTCODE_HINT: Please enter your postcode as it is printed on the jury summons letter, even if this might be incorrect. You can change it further on.
FIELD_POSTCODE_HINT_OB: Please enter the person's postcode as it is printed on the jury summons letter, even if this might be incorrect. You can change it further on.
FIELD_THIRD_PARTY_LABEL: I'm replying on behalf of someone else
